channel.title: So, I want to buy a PC
channel.description:
..and I went on Newegg, and found some parts, so, rate?
ASUS 18X DVD±R DVD Burner with LightScribe and 14X DVD-RAM Write Black SATA Model DRW-1814BLT - OEM Item #: N82E16827135145 Return Policy: Standard Return Policy $65.98 ($32.99 each) APEVIA X-CRUISER-BK Black Steel ATX Mid Tower Computer Case - Retail Item #: N82E16811144151 Return Policy: Standard Return Policy -$20.00 Instant $10.00 Mail-in Rebate $79.99 $59.99 SONY Black 1.44MB 3.5" Internal Floppy Drive Windows 98SE/ ME/ 2000/ XP - OEM Item #: N82E16821103116 Return Policy: Standard Return Policy $7.99 Seagate Barracuda 7200.10 ST3500630AS 500GB 7200 RPM SATA 3.0Gb/s Hard Drive - OEM Item #: N82E16822148136 Return Policy: Limited 30-Day Return Policy $119.99 ASUS M2R32-MVP Socket AM2 AMD 580X CrossFire ATX AMD Motherboard - Retail Item #: N82E16813131095 Return Policy: Limited 30-Day Return Policy $118.99 LINKSKEY LKA-CR15BW 52-in-1 USB 2.0 Internal 3.5" USB Card Reader - Retail Item #: N82E16820309001 Return Policy: Standard Return Policy $13.99 Arctic Silver 5 Thermal Compound - OEM Item #: N82E16835100007 Return Policy: Consumable Items Return Policy $5.99 PNY XLR8 2GB (2 x 1GB) 240-Pin DDR2 SDRAM DDR2 800 (PC2 6400) Dual Channel Kit Desktop Memory Model D22GX64XL-4 - Retail Item #: N82E16820178148 Return Policy: Memory (Modules, USB) Return Policy -$40.00 Instant $159.99 $119.99 AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ Windsor 2.8GHz Socket AM2 Processor Model ADA5600IAA6CZ - OEM Item #: N82E16819103770 Return Policy: Processors (CPUs) Return Policy $159.00 ARCTIC COOLING ACF64LP 60mm CPU Cooler for low profile PC - Retail Item #: N82E16835186019 Return Policy: Standard Return Policy $19.99 Subtotal: $691.90 Calculate Shipping Zip Code: GO Shipping: $37.83
total is ~$730USD Rate/hate/masturbate/ejaculate/criticize?

item.title: So, I want to buy a PC
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:2, topic:133541”]Floppy drive = fail.

Are they all rated 4/5 stars on newegg?[/quote]
I need a floppy drive for when I test my ASM programs.

Read full topic
item.source: So, I want to buy a PC

item.title: So, I want to buy a PC
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Go for a Athlon X2 6000+ if you have the cash…

You wont need the thermal paste if your not going to overclock.

Didn’t look at everything but it looks ok I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: So, I want to buy a PC
